@Kurome: The train scene is about their family going on a trip somewhere, and maybe because they are not "officially" married, she referred to Kotarou as a "friend".
The extra chapter is, I think, the continuation from page 141, in Kotarou's point of view. After saying goodbye to Hirugao and Azami, he continues to search for Hitsuji, while the other 2 go to the room in which they do what we saw on page 167 and later joined by Ninjin. Because of the conversation they had in the extra chapter, Kotarou leaves them there since he knows they wanted it, and only takes Ninjin and Hitsuji with him.

I must say... I don't quite get the extra chapters at page 202 and the one after that. the first one isn't really in line with the story, as Azami should still be in the room i.e fucking Ninjin up and her Dad. 

And the second is Hitsuji with her son in a train (+Kotaro?) talking with a total stranger about what? I doesn't make sense for me.
Man, hitsuji such a  best girl if her dad didnt fuck her up... literaly
